channel.title: Loading a server
channel.description:
Hi! My computer doesn't load any private server but moparscape :@ How come??? I downloaded WarScape and I'd like to edit it! Is something wrong with this code? [code]@echo off title LunaScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code] Maybe it's wrong because all those files aren't in the folder! (Mysql-connecter-java-3.0.16-ga-bin.jar and jython.jar) or maybe because i didn't install jdk on a costum folder! So please help me :)
Grtz Sagabmx & Matthias9

item.title: Loading a server
item.dc:creator: @dandy99 dandy99
item.description:
@dandy99 wrote:

this goes to all people out there, with javac problems, right click compile.bat and click edit, then change the middle bit where it says javac.java* or something to this
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe” server
^^^^
or change thease to what you got.

how simple…?

Read full topic

item.title: Loading a server
item.dc:creator: @sagabmx sagabmx
item.description:
@sagabmx wrote:

Hi!
My computer doesn’t load any private server but moparscape :@
How come???
I downloaded WarScape and I’d like to edit it!
Is something wrong with this code?

@echo off title LunaScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
Maybe it’s wrong because all those files aren’t in the folder! (Mysql-connecter-java-3.0.16-ga-bin.jar and jython.jar) or maybe because i didn’t install jdk on a costum folder!
So please help me

Grtz Sagabmx & Matthias9

Read full topic
